availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Key of the environment name (prefix of the name)
Value of the environmentkey/name. If not passed the environment will be deleted

Value of the environmentkey/name. If not passed the environment will be deleted
Flag, which shows if the respective value is hidden from the subusers
Flag, which shows if the respective value is hidden from the subusers
If set to YES only the subuser's partentuser has write access to the environment
If set to YES only the subuser's partentuser has read access to the environment
